synthesis_conditions.notes: Colorless bulk crystals of 1 can be readily oxidized to brown form o-1 upon prolonged exposure to air at room temperature.

characterization.findings: Patterns consistent with as-synthesized bulk o-1 and calculated from crystal data, implying structure maintenance.
No functional groups change during the exfoliation.
Uniform thickness of 4.2 ± 0.3 nm, corresponding to about ten iron-organic layers.

synthesis_conditions.notes: High-quality MOL nanolayers with uniform thickness and large area were successfully obtained.
